document_data.caption: A map showing Cobble Road in west Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Cobble Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Cobble Road''' was a street located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Cobble Road was located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] of west Zhentil Keep. The road originated at a major intersection directly in front of the [[Trail Gate]] and passed southeast through the quarter. It bordered the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] for most of its length. Cobble Road was intersected by [[Wyvern Road]], [[Plague Street]], [[Fortress Street]], [[Nool Street]], [[Dixon Street]], and [[Pain Street]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The popular [[Zhentilar]] tavern called the [[Axe and the Minotaur]] was located on Cobble Road.
